column3:
I'll do a further PR with further changes when they are in.

Getting the larger changes that have been made the past few weeks in will make further diffs for updates smaller.

Tested ACK (on x86_64 and ARM32) - ran tests and succesfully sent a testnet transaction. 
Code changes check out although I have been unable to review all the secp256k1 changes in detail, that would require a lot more time.
commithash 0dcfb91d5603f2212536d78260a3f2b16cb05a34
([signature](https://dev.visucore.com/bitcoin/acks/5425))
ACK.  I reviewed and tested each one the underlying changes extensively under the libsecp256k1 repository.\n
